feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
